tool_description: This API  is capable of detecting hair colour from a person's image using deep neural network with high accuracy .
name: Hair Colour Detection
title: Hair Colour Detection

api_list.name: Testing Conncetion
api_list.description: This endpoint is provided to test the connection  between User and the endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hair-colour-detection.p.rapidapi.com/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hair-colour-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hair-colour-detection.p.rapidapi.com/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hair-colour-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
